second_translate: By the way,

hangle: 차라리 어둠의 존재 자체를 없앨 방법은 없는 건가요?
first_translate: ...isn’t there a way to get rid of the darkness entirely?
second_translate: Isn't there a way to eliminate the very existence of darkness?

hangle: 오, 클로비스 후작님과 똑같은 말씀을 하시는군요.
first_translate: oh, that’s exactly what marquess clovis said.
second_translate: Oh, that’s exactly what Marquess Clovis said.
Do you know the Marquess?
This hill is steep.
Of course.

hangle: 아카데미에 가장 많은 연구비를 후원해 주시는 분이죠.
first_translate: he’s the one who provides the most research funds to the academy.
second_translate: He’s the biggest financial supporter of the academy’s research.

first_translate: he’s someone who understands the importance of research.
second_translate: He is someone who recognizes the importance of research.
We're truly grateful from our perspective.
And...

first_translate: ...even without that, he’s a very impressive person.
second_translate: …even aside from that, he’s a really amazing person.
I see...
He has a good image.
By the way,

first_translate: I didn’t know he was making independent efforts like this.
second_translate: I didn't know he had been making consistent independent efforts.

hangle: 역시 아렌트는 의심스럽긴 해도 대단한 인물이긴 해.
first_translate: arendt may be suspicious, but he’s still an impressive person.
second_translate: Arendt may be suspicious, but he's undoubtedly an impressive person.
Actually,

hangle: 저희도 어둠을 없애는 걸 목표로 연구를 진행 중 입니다만…
first_translate: we’re also conducting research with the goal of eliminating the darkness,
second_translate: We’re also conducting research with the goal of eliminating darkness,

first_translate: but we haven’t made much progress.
second_translate: We haven't made much progress.

first_translate: we did find out that magic, darkness, and the divine power the saint has...
second_translate: We did find out that magic, darkness, and the divine power possessed by the Saint...

hangle: 전부 유기적인 관계가 있다는 걸 알아내기는 했지만요.
second_translate: We've discovered that they are all organically connected.

first_translate: divine power is a force that’s completely opposite to magic,
second_translate: Divine power is a force that is completely opposite to magic.

hangle: 그리고 마력은 근본적으로 어둠과 유사한 성질.
first_translate: and magic is fundamentally similar to darkness.
second_translate: And magic is fundamentally similar in nature to darkness.

hangle: 또한 마력과 마력석은 서로 상호작용을 하죠.
first_translate: magic and magic stones also interact with each other.
second_translate: Magic and magic stones also interact with each other.

hangle: 그러니 그쪽을 연구하면 뭔가 답이 나올지도 몰라요.
first_translate: so if we study that, we might find an answer.
second_translate: So if we research that area, we might find some answers.
…You’re quite knowledgeable.

hangle: 관심 분야가 비슷한 분을 만나게 되어 기뻐요.
first_translate: I’m glad to meet someone with similar interests.
second_translate: I'm glad to meet someone who shares my interests.

first_translate: my name is jane. please feel free to call me by my name.
second_translate: My name is Jane. Please feel free to call me Jane.
I'm Fiona Heylon.

hangle: 헤일론은 마물의 습격이 잦아 자연히 이쪽에 관심이 생겼답니다. 잘 부탁드려요.
first_translate: there are frequent attacks by demons in heylon, so I naturally became interested in this field. it’s nice to meet you.
second_translate: There are frequent monster attacks in Heylon, so I naturally became interested in this field. I look forward to working with you.

hangle: 헤일론 영애, 이걸 안 물을 수가 없는데요.
first_translate: lady fiona, I have to ask you this.
second_translate: Lady Heylon, I can't not ask this.

hangle: 영애께서는 어둠이 최근에 활발해진 이유가 뭐라고 생각하시나요?
first_translate: what do you think is the reason for the recent increase in darkness?
second_translate: What do you think is the reason the darkness has become more active recently?
Hmm...
…That's a tough question.

first_translate: to be honest, I’m curious about that too...
second_translate: To be honest, I'm curious about that too...

hangle: 이 세계의 사람들은 어둠을 자연재해와 비슷하게 생각한다.
first_translate: people in this world think of darkness as a natural disaster.
second_translate: People in this world regard darkness as something akin to a natural disaster.

hangle: 일 년에 한두 번 강한 태풍이 오면 일대가 엉망이 되어버리지만,
first_translate: when a strong storm hits once or twice a year, it wreaks havoc on the area,
second_translate: When a strong typhoon hits once or twice a year, it wreaks havoc on the area,

hangle: 죽은 땅도 긴 시간이 지나면 어느 정도 회복된다.
first_translate: but even dead land recovers to some extent over time.
second_translate: Even dead land recovers to some extent over time.

hangle: 하지만 최근 어둠의 등장이 잦아져 다들 위기의식을 느낀 거겠지.
first_translate: however, the recent increase in darkness has made everyone feel a sense of crisis.
second_translate: However, the recent frequent appearances of darkness have made everyone feel a sense of crisis.

hangle: 제인처럼 어둠이 기승을 부리는 이유가 궁금한 사람이 많을 거다.
first_translate: many people will be curious about the reason for the surge in darkness, just like jane.
second_translate: Many people, like Jane, are curious about why the darkness is becoming more rampant.
Some people have said this.

hangle: 근래 어둠이 자주 나타나게 된 건
first_translate: ...that the reason darkness has been appearing so often lately...
second_translate: That the reason darkness has been appearing so frequently lately...
Surely,
Because God is angry.

hangle: 듣자 하니 관련된 종교도 생겼다는 모양이에요.
first_translate: I heard that a religion related to this has also emerged.
second_translate: I heard that a religion related to this has even emerged.
Even a religion?

first_translate: saint yoanna, this is the northern part of the village.
second_translate: Saint, this is the northern part of the village.

hangle: 숲과 마을… 어느 쪽을 먼저 정화하는 게 좋을까요?
first_translate: which should we purify first, the forest or the village?
second_translate: Which should we purify first, the forest or the village?
Hm...

first_translate: I think we should start with the forest.
second_translate: I think the forest would be better.
God's wrath...
And a religion.
Did I write something like this?
Are these events...

hangle: 정말로 신이 화가 난 탓에 일어난 걸까?
second_translate: Is this really caused by God's anger?
No,

hangle: 애초에 신이란 건 있는지 없는지도 모르는걸.
first_translate: I don’t even know if god exists in the first place.
second_translate: I don’t even know if God exists in the first place.
Then...

first_translate: if it’s not the work of god,
second_translate: …If this isn’t the work of God,

first_translate: could it be the work of humans?
second_translate: Could it have been caused by humans?
Hey, you.

hangle: 조사 끝나고 돌아올 때는 무언가 복잡한 얼굴이었다가,
first_translate: you looked troubled when you came back from the investigation,
second_translate: You had a complicated look on your face when you returned from the investigation,

first_translate: but after you saw me and stared at me for a while,
second_translate: But after you saw me and stared intently for a while,
your expression changed into a smirk.
What’s with you?
Was I smiling?

hangle: 똥개 중에서 가장 잘생긴 똥개라고 생각하니 그만.
first_translate: I was just thinking that you’re the best-looking among the mutts.
second_translate: I just thought that you're the best-looking among the mutts, that's all.
It’s nothing special.

first_translate: do I have something on my face?
second_translate: …Do I have something on my face?
What are you laughing about?
I'm just surprised all over again.

hangle: 겨울의 수호자라길래, 처음에는 몸집이 태산만 한 사람일 거라 생각했거든…
first_translate: when I first heard you were the protector of winter, I thought you’d be as big as a mountain...
second_translate: When I first heard you were the Protector of Winter, I thought you’d be as big as a mountain...
Sorry to disappoint you, but I'm just an ordinary person.
Ordinary?

first_translate: there’s no one as unique as you--
second_translate: There's no one as unusual as you...
My lady.

hangle: 어둠이 같은 곳에 두 번 올 수도 있나?
first_translate: can the darkness come to the same place twice?
second_translate: Can the darkness appear in the same place twice?
R-Run away!
The darkness is coming!
There’s no time to gather our belongings!

first_translate: get on your horses and move as quickly as possible!
second_translate: Get on your horse and move as fast as you can!

hangle: 엑스트라 기사들은 비전투 인원에게 최대한 붙는다!
first_translate: extra knights, stay close to the non-combat personnel!
second_translate: Extra knights, stick as close as possible to the non-combat personnel!
Yes, sir!

first_translate: the darkness is approaching too quickly.
second_translate: The darkness is approaching too fast.
What should I do...?
Hey!
I brought a horse.
Thanks!
Where is Siegren?

first_translate: he’s helping with the evacuation in the north.
second_translate: He’s helping with the evacuation in the northern area.

first_translate: if you see him, tell him to be careful!
second_translate: If you happen to see him, tell him to stay safe!
Wait.

first_translate: you’re not thinking of staying here, are you?
second_translate: You're not planning to stay here, are you?

first_translate: you should evacuate to the forest right away too, my lady.
second_translate: You should evacuate to the forest right away as well, my lady.
I was worried.
Gunter, you should be the one to go back!

first_translate: staying behind is as good as suicide.
second_translate: Staying behind is as good as suicide.
You really could die.

hangle: 위험한 상황에서 윗대가리가 가장 먼저 내빼면,
first_translate: if the higher-ups run away first in a dangerous situation,
second_translate: If the higher-ups are the first to flee in a dangerous situation,

first_translate: it will only cause more chaos.
second_translate: It will only make things more chaotic.
I'm sorry.

hangle: 공작한테 부탁을 받은 게 있어서 말이다.
first_translate: but I made a promise to the duke.
second_translate: The duke asked me for a favor.

first_translate: he said, “if my daughter foolishly runs toward death,
second_translate: He said, "If my daughter foolishly runs toward death,

first_translate: do whatever it takes to save her.”
second_translate: Do whatever it takes to save her, no matter what.
So that's what he said.
Attack if you want.

first_translate: I’m confident I can beat you.
second_translate: I'm confident I can win.
Well,
Don't worry too much.
I'll make sure to bring everyone back safely!
